Header: Two boys shot dead while playing in snow
Content: Two children were shot dead as they played in the snow in Minneapolis, before the gunman fled into a house in a possible hostage situation. Investigators believe the incident is a domestic incident. Neighbors were evacuated for their safety as police continued to try to make contact with the suspect. Officers arrived on scene where they found two boys suffering from gunshot wounds. They were swiftly moved to a squad car where officers determined they were dead.
